I have been searching for a robe like this.  It is perfect. Very generous in sizing, so I washed and dried it on hot and it's just right... still oversized, but just like a robe should be! Love the color too!

I love bathrobes and had serval good ones and bad ones. This bathrobe is by far my favorite! It’s thick, heavy, and of quality. Those who complain about the roughness or thickness need to buy some flimsy plush robes. This product is not for whiners but is made for real ‘Robies!

I’m tall and I wanted a full length robe. Unlike many reviewers I LOVE the terry “towel” like fabric. It keeps me warm but also prevents me from overheating & sweating.  The sash is long too, you can tie it without fear of it coming open.  It also washed very well with very little, if any shrinkage. I love it so much I bought it in a darker color for winter.

I'm 5' 8", 150 lbs. I ordered an XL because of the length. I like my robe at the ankles. The length turned out fine, but the robe is a little big. It's well made, but rather heavy. I wish I could have gotten the large at the same length.
Nice and heavy. Exactly what I was looking for. I'm 5'6  128lbs and I got the medium. Normally I would get small so do size up.

评论概述: Love the color and the comfort

I love the blue gray color, it makes my blue eyes pop. (my family tells me this)

评论概述: As advertised; cotton, medium weight, great color, long length

评论概述: Was from my Amazon wish list - certified buyer - this is a great robe!
评论详情: I wanted a long cotton robe to wear during the cold months, and chose the dark blue robe to add to my wish list for xmas. This is what I was hoping for.  I wear a size medium but asked for it in large because I thought the medium might be a little short (for someone above average height). This is a good length. The sleeves have a heavy cuff that folds back and stays folded and the belt loop actually has two positions on each side of the robe for a higher or lower waist.

I LOVE this robe.  It is heavy enough to keep out the cold but light enough to not weigh on my shoulders.  I am 5'5" 165 pounds, it hits my ankles perfectly, just what I wanted.  I wear it outside to do some of my feeding chores in the morning, it is perfect.
Very comfortable

Long, thick robe. However, it feels like a rough towel. I have washed it a few times and tried fabric softener too since it’s towel material. Still rough which is a shame. Bought this for my daughter who asked for a super warm, soft good quality robe. It is warm.
Very disappointed in this robe. After 2 weeks of ware the robe is shredding. For the price of this robe I would have thought it would have been a better quality.
Too pricey for quality of robe.

评论概述: Very thick cotton; shrinks so size up
评论详情: This is a very thick terry robe- quality is nice. It is not stifling - I find it very comfortable. The full length is perfect- I am 5’5” and the robe is down to my ankles - exactly what I wanted.  The instructions say to wash before you wear it and air dry or dry on low (I think). I dried it on medium since the Terry is so thick and it shrank a bit. Now it does not wrap in front as much as I would prefer. But it’s still very nice. It was hard to find a floor length winter robe. I recommend this.

I like the length of this robe. I got it for winter to have something to wear after shower. I've ended up keeping it on after just to lounge, and I will also wear it for warmth. It's not the softest, it really like wearing a thick towel. It is very warm. I am 5'3", I got a Medium, and it falls to my ankles. The only down side is that the terry loops are quite prone to snagging, so I've have to trim the snags as they happen to avoid having the robe become a shaggy mess.
Been looking for awhile for a bathrobe that went to the floor and in terry cloth. Found this and just what I wanted!  Love to snuggle up in it in the morning to drink my coffee.
this is a nice heavy, warm robe. Enjoy.
My wife got this robe for when we get out of our hot tub. It’s very well made, soft and absorbent.  Thick and warm. Highly recommended.
I ordered a medium & it’s very roomy.  A small would’ve worked out, but the extra space is comfortable as well.  True to size fir sure.

Think of a mid-grade Canon bath towel: the looping, the amount of loops per inch and that is exactly what the terry fabric of this robe is. It's a nice bathrobe. The hem falls on my feet. It's going to fabulous in the winter months after a nice bath, and nice during the long Southern summers when the AC is on too high. I ordered the purple and it's beautiful. The sleeve length is perfect. It's a bathrobe that I will have a hard time taking off during the winter months. Love it!

First of all, I love this robe. It's very thick, plush fabric, and it does come all the way down to my ankles (I'm 5'6", 175lb, and got an X-Large). It wraps all the way around me, with nice overlap, and wicks away damp wonderfully. I've had terry robes that are silkier, with longer yarn-loops, but this is much thicker and more absorbent than those, and a wash with a generous bit of fabric softener made it come out plush and soft. No snagging in three months of regular use, either. It's almost the perfect winter bathrobe.  The one down-side is the belt loops. They're spaced for men, not women, and just don't come up far enough to put the belt around my actual waist. I'm going to have to add my own set of loops for that.  That said, the robe is, in every other respect, exactly what I wanted. Do be aware, though, that it _is_ heavy. This is a lot of cotton, and the weight matches the density. If you're looking for something light-weight, I recommend a Sioro cotton knit robe instead.

It took me years to settle on a robe that I thought was right.  My old robe was 35 years old, and well loved, so I wanted another one like it.  That is, a long bathrobe that wasn’t too heavy, but one that was very absorbent.  After reading many, many reviews, I took a chance on this one.  It’s a beautiful, well made robe that’s highly absorbent, and fits well.  At 5’5” and 153 lbs, their sizing chart suggested a large, so that’s what I went with. As everyone else says, the sleeves are too long, but you can increase the size of the roll up cuff so it fits you.  I’m very happy with this purchase, and would recommend it to my sisters.

评论概述: I Love This Robe it is perfect
评论详情: This robe is perfect...unlike the first one I bought it fits over whatever I am wearing to stay warm and it is everything the reviews say
horse blankets are softer
Purchased as a gift from my dad to my mom (ages 95 & 87). She likes it because it is warm but not too fluffy or bulky. It is long enough for her and looks good--we purchased the lavender.
Warm and cozy. Exactly what I wanted....after a nice bath or shower....on a cold evening snuggle heaven.

I  like this housecoat other then the fact it does not have an inside tie on it.?? Unless you tie it tight it tends to loosen. Then it is uneven in the front and isn't as good at keeping you covered.I will be sewing one in myself. Which is fine but.. it really should have had one.

I wear a small in everything.  I purchased the Med so it would be oversized, but it fit without being oversized.  It’s a good robe, nice quality.  If I had ordered my true size of small I would have had to return it.

Had a bad experience with a different companies robe running to small.  This one I made sure to get a large just in case.  It is big on me (gives me more to wrap around).  The robe is very long and touches the ground (YES!!  Just what I wanted for half the price of the other one).  The robe is very warm, which is great for those cold mornings) very comfortable and just the right weight.  If you are looking for a terry robe without the hood then this is for you.

Robe is fine- little bit lighter weight terry than the one it replaced (Crabtree & Evelyn).  Watch the sizing. If you are anything BUT the lower end of the size range (height +weight) go up a size.  I bought the Small. I am 5' 1 1/2", 90 lbs, 32-25-32 and its JUST FITS. No way would this fit someone who was larger in any way - not height, not weight and not in measurements
When it says "long" they aren't kidding!  This goes down to the tops of my feet.  Very warm and quite heavy which makes it perfect for the cold winter nights in Wisconsin.

Finally a nice thick bathrobe that fits. It isn’t ultra lush and soft, but maybe it will soften with more washes. What matters is that it’s warm. I keep my bedroom below 60°F during the winter, and it is perfect for getting out of bed in the mornings!
Not quite as soft as I had hoped; perhaps it will improve after multiple washing.

I am 5’5’ and ordered an extra large. It drags a bit on the floor. However I still love it!  I heat my home with wood so there are several hours a day where it’s a bit chilly in here and this robe is great to curl up with. It covers me all up like a small blanket while I’m waiting for the place to warm up.  The material feels nice as well. It’s not super bulky and it’s not super thin.  I had a bunch of other robes that I actually threw in the trash after realizing how nice this one is. I will be ordering one or two more for sure, just a size large instead of extra large

I love a slightly oversized, floor length robe and this does not disappoint.  I ordered a larger size simply for that reason.  This is quality at a lower price than I have paid for others.  Thick, weighty and will be ideal for the winter months.  Just what I wanted.
washed for the first time...belt COMPLETLY came apart!!
The feel and weight are just right, perfect for stepping into out of the shower.
Love it!
I use a terry robe to dry off instead of a towel.  This robe is very well made.  No problem after washer and dryer.
One sleeve is longed than the other. Other than that is a nice robe.
It is beautifully soft but very heavy and long. I purchased it for my mother who is 5ft tall. It's perfect for when she is cold.
This robe is exactly what I was looking for: full length - yes, really! - soft, well constructed, not too heavy, and very comfortable. I love it.
Loved the fit, love the color.  Very pleased.
Sturdy, soft, washes well, warm, flexible.
Love it

I can’t speak for everyone but I love it and will get another.

评论概述: This robe fits me just right
评论详情: I am 5'7" tall, this robe hits my ankles. I wear size 18 pants and the XL robe wraps well and fits in hips. I carry my weight below my waist and this robe fits on top also. If I had a choice, I'd prefer a different color, but I chose the maroon because it was as close as I could get to scarlet or Royal. I am pleased with my purchase.
